title: Why do i keep getting champion shards every single box i open?
body: I have literally gotten at least 5 champion shards in a row? Am I just very unlucky, or have I done something? I haven't bought chests in a very long time, just using keys... just curious if everyone else is getting the same?

replies.body: Havent bought any chests. Right now Ive got 9 sitting there. Last 4-5 chests I've opened have all been champion shards for champs I already own. Feelsbadman

I've bought a fair few boxes myself.

Once i bought the 11 pack and got 10 skins shards and an icon. Another time i got 2 skins shards and 9 champion shards.

Just random.

Now that I own all the champs, I find buying them tends to not be worth. You get roughly the same RP worth as you spend on average (plus shards).

So say, you spend 1950. I get about 2200 worth of skins and 1 or 2 champ shards left over. May as well just buy mystery skins really.

I got DJ Sona, SGU and Pulsefire Ez from Boxes soooo i mean, it does work out sometimes. But still I find the 490 for a mystery much more worth.

For a while now I've been keeping track of my Hextech experience in an excel spreadsheet (which is turning out quite enjoyable for some reason). Of the free, as opposed to bought, chests I've opened, 16 contained skin shards and 12 contained champion shards. Of course, that's way too small a sample size to make any major conclusions but I will say that looking at what I received in sequence shows that even though a certain type of shard may have been favoured at a time it's actually quite close in the long run. 

You might just be going through an unlucky phase right now, only time will tell!
